Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Exception

package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Exception
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColorTakenException
    Exception that is thrown when a pawn color is already taken
    DisconnectedException
    Exception thrown if a client is disconnected
    EmptyDeckException
    Exception that is thrown when a deck is empty
    GameNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when searching for a Game that doesn't exist
    InvalidInputException
    Exception that is thrown when the input given it's not valid (general)
    NicknameTakenException
    Exception that is thrown when a nickname is taken
    NoPossiblePlacement
    Exception thrown if the Coords chosen aren't valid/available
    NotPlaceableException
    Exception thrown if a card is not placeable in the coordinates chosen
    NullNicknameException
    Exception that is thrown when the nickname is null or empty
    NumOfPlayersException
    Exception that is thrown when the player number is not between 2 and 4
